content: meet the history of the leaves wrap an ode to a product of nature leaves they come in many shapes colors and ways of use i was inspired by them to create this lovely wrap pattern which is a semi-lace look made in heavier weighted yarn - like the example you can wrap yourself into it to protect yourself from cold weather however made in the lighter type of yarns it can also be a perfect spring or summer item some general information about the pattern **yarn requirements ** 1 scheepjes whirligig 207 green to blue scheepjes whirligig comes in cakes of 450 grams with a length of 1000 meters the yarn consists of 20% alpaca and 80% virgin wool - however the pattern is also perfect for a scheepjes whirl the outcome will be a bit smaller but as the whirligig version is large it would be no problem **crochet hook needed ** you will use a 4 0mm hook in this pattern **size ** the scarf will be approximately 195cm long the width of the scarf will be about 40cm stitch use in this pattern is pretty basic and therefore perfect for beginners as well - the pattern is available for free download in english us terms and dutch you ll get a pdf file after downloading it - the pattern includes written instructions and a chart for the pattern
